relation: Love & Struggle: Beyond the Rubber Estates
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {1258=Since 2006, dozens of novels first drafted during NaNoWriMo have been traditionally published. Countless more have been self-published, and many have even been printed in their authors’ native languages. Please excuse our boasting; we can’t help but feel proud.}

textBeforeTable: Featured Wrimos   Published in Non-English Languages Self-Published Traditionally Published (Would you like to be added to this page? Fill out this form!) In addition to our comprehensive lists of published authors, we’ll regularly feature eight randomly selected NaNo-novels at the top of this page to showcase the wide range of published authors who started their first drafts during NaNoWriMo. You can also visit our blog to read interviews with some of these novelists who went all the way with the fruits of their NaNo labor. Since 2006, dozens of novels first drafted during NaNoWriMo have been traditionally published. Countless more have been self-published, and many have even been printed in their authors’ native languages. Please excuse our boasting; we can’t help but feel proud.
